title: Approve design for spec mvp-2-setup-bpm-and-loop-bars
response:
Feedback Summary (2 comments):

General Comments:
1. Technical considerations regarding the input area used for entering BPM and bars are insufficient. Furthermore, redesign the input area implementation assuming the use of tui_input (https://docs.rs/tui-input/latest/tui_input/).
2. When implementing pop-ups, use tui-popup (https://crates.io/crates/tui-popup) from tui_widgets (https://docs.rs/tui-widgets/latest/tui_widgets/) as the basis. Clearly state this in the documentation and proceed with the design accordingly.
